name: Stig and the Meteor
description:
Take on the role of Stig, the royal messenger boy, on a quest to save the realm from an oncoming meteor disaster. Explore a Scandinavian inspired fantasy world to find four legendary heroes to vanquish the threat of meteoric destruction.

Disclaimer:
This demo is a work in progress. Things will most definitely change and improve.
Design choices will be made and features represented here may or may not appear in the finished game. This demo is limited and contains five quests and one location.

Supported input devices: mouse and keyboard or game pad
